name: GriffinCenterPointPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open griffin center point”
”Alexa, ask griffin center point for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start griffin center point”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: griffin center point
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Pastor Mark and Michelle Davenport. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
